signature: static String toPropertyKey(final String file, final String key)
name: toPropertyKey
lookup
javadoc:
/** * Looks up the value for the key in the format "DocumentPath:XPath". *

* For example: "com/domain/document.xml::/path/to/node". *

*

* Note the use of "::" instead of ":" to allow for "C:" drive letters in paths. *

* * @param key the key to be looked up, may be null * @return The value associated with the key. */
